channel.title: SamR's Assorted Musings and Rants
channel.description: A curmudgeonly faculty member in cmoputer science writes about a variety of topics.

item.title: Musing #541: My coding habits
item.description: Ways I think about updating code. (At least that's what I planned to write about.)

item.title: Musing #540: Today's question
item.description: The things my children ask.

item.title: Musing #539: Logging my time (Week three of Spring Semester 2018)
item.description: Learning too much about my (bad) work habits.

item.title: Musing #538: Missing fifty-five musings
item.description: It appears that I don't muse every day.

item.title: Musing #537: When work and family conflict
item.description: What happens when work obligations and family obligations conflict? The answer should be obvious.

item.title: Musing #536: On being a workaholic
item.description: Work the AP reading or take a cruise? The answer should be obvious.

item.title: Musing #535: Friday nights
item.description: They provide less time for work than I need..

item.title: Musing #534: Sleep Cycles
item.description: What's the point of Powerpoint?

item.title: Musing #533: "Minnesota nice"
item.description: What does that term mean?

item.title: Musing #532: Becoming someone else's assigned reading
item.description: Something I had not expected.

item.title: Musing #531: Logging my time
item.description: Where does the time go?

item.title: Musing #530: A nine-month contract
item.description: If we have nine-month contracts, why can't we be paid for three months over the summer?

item.title: Musing #529: Shared governance
item.description: Something Grinnell needs to work on..

item.title: Musing #528: Failing to muse
item.description: One of those days that I just can't write.

item.title: Musing #527: The magic commons fairies
item.description: I have no idea who you are, but I appreciate you..

item.title: Musing #526: Another month of musing
item.description: Restarting the monthly meta-musings.

item.title: Musing #525: A coat and tie
item.description: What I seem to be wearing this semester.

item.title: Musing #524: JAVA
item.description: What does that acronym stand for?

item.title: Musing #523: The 2018 Grinnell Posse Plus Retreat
item.description: Reflections on a weekend discussing complex topics with students and colleagues.

item.description: Food choices.
